question: 軍隊
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>army</kanji> <kanji>squad</kanji> is <vocabulary>an army</vocabulary>. It's also just the <vocabulary>army</vocabulary>. It refers more to "an" army rather than "the" army. Just a group of people who do army things.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
